nodes.bodyText: What would outputStream be if it comes to the else clause?

ballerina-lang/bvm/ballerina-runtime/src/main/java/org/ballerinalang/jvm/BallerinaXMLSerializer.java
    
    
         Line 153
      in
      5a44cf7
    
    
    
    

        
          
           xmlValue.getChildrenSeq().serialize(this); 
        
    
  

 here the outputStream is BallerinaXMLSerializer, which means we just want to append serialized xml to this outputStream.
Else it's a generic output stream that doesn't know how to write an xml value, so we decorate it with BallerinaXMLSerializer which knows how to write xml values.
